item.title: Report X-2023091022
item.description:
Report X-2023091022

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-19
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was removed from the package flow due to slightly wet external carton. DescribePack: Upon inspection 4-gallon bottles of Zep driveway & concrete cleaner had leaked some of the liquid through the sides of the cap. All four bottles were wet along bottle handles and the inside of the package was stained and wet. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a lined tote.

item.title: Report I-2023100002
item.description:
Report I-2023100002

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-25T00:33:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-15
  • City: PUYALLUP
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FERRELLGAS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Bobtail drier was driving on Hwy 512 in the far left lane, there was a dump truck hauling a pump trailer in front of him. Apparently a vehicle in front of the dump truck hit its brakes, the dump truck hit its brakes and our bobtail rear ended the truck truck& its trailer. The Ferrellgas employee was injured and sought medical treatment at Concentra Urgent care where he was treated and released for cuts, bruises to both legs and knees. The bolt on the pump broke and the gas in the lines to the meter released. Our employee was able to shut off the valve to the release.
